AT.name: Pokémon™ Mystery Dungeon: Team Rot
AT.description: Du hast sie gefangen, du hast sie trainiert und du hast mit ihnen gekämpft - aber jetzt kannst du herausfinden, wie es ist, ein Pokémon zu sein! In Pokémon Mystery Dungeon: Team Rot wachst du in einer Welt auf, die nur von Pokémon bewohnt wird. Auch du selbst bist ein Pokémon, ohne dass du weißt, wie du dorthin gekommen bist, oder wie du wieder ein Mensch werden kannst. Aber vielleicht gibt es einen Grund dafür, dass du hier bist. Jetzt, wo du die Pokémonsprache verstehen kannst, erfährst du, dass die Gemeinschaft von einer Reihe von Naturkatastrophen bedroht wird. Du freundest dich schnell mit anderen Pokémon an und bildest ein Team, um Pokémon in Gefahr zu helfen. Deine Aufgabe wird es sein, Pokémon zu befreien, die in gefährlichen Verliesen gefangen sind, welche jedes Mal neu und zufällig erzeugt werden (du wirst also nie zwei Mal das gleiche Verlies spielen), wobei du dich in rundenbasierten Kämpfen gegen wilde Pokémon zur Wehr setzt.

movies.name: Pokémon™ Mystery Dungeon: Team Rot: Video

AU.name: Pokémon™ Mystery Dungeon: Red Rescue Team
AU.description: You've caught them, you've trained them and you've battled them - but now you can find out what it's actually like to be a Pokémon! In Pokémon Mystery Dungeon: Red Rescue Team, you wake up in a world inhabited entirely by Pokémon, as a Pokémon yourself, with no knowledge of how you got there or how you can return to human form. But perhaps there's a reason for your arrival. Now that you can understand the Pokémon language, you learn that a series of natural disasters is threatening the community. You soon befriend another Pokémon and form a Rescue Team to help Pokémon in distress. You receive missions to rescue Pokémon trapped in dangerous dungeons, which are always randomly generated (meaning that you'll never play the same dungeon twice), battling wild Pokémon using a turn-based style of combat.

movies.name: Pokémon™ Mystery Dungeon: Red Rescue Team: Video

BG.name: Pokémon™ Mystery Dungeon: Red Rescue Team
BG.description: You've caught them, you've trained them and you've battled them - but now you can find out what it's actually like to be a Pokémon! In Pokémon Mystery Dungeon: Red Rescue Team, you wake up in a world inhabited entirely by Pokémon, as a Pokémon yourself, with no knowledge of how you got there or how you can return to human form. But perhaps there's a reason for your arrival. Now that you can understand the Pokémon language, you learn that a series of natural disasters is threatening the community. You soon befriend another Pokémon and form a Rescue Team to help Pokémon in distress. You receive missions to rescue Pokémon trapped in dangerous dungeons, which are always randomly generated (meaning that you'll never play the same dungeon twice), battling wild Pokémon using a turn-based style of combat.

movies.name: Pokémon™ Mystery Dungeon: Red Rescue Team: Video

BE.name: Pokémon™ Donjon Mystère : Equipe de Secours Rouge
BE.description: Vous en avez attrapé, entraîné et affronté, mais aujourd'hui, il est temps de découvrir ce que ça fait d'être dans la peau d'un Pokémon ! Dans Pokémon Donjon Mystère : Equipe de Secours Rouge, vous vous réveillez dans un monde entièrement peuplé de Pokémon et vous vous apercevez que vous en êtes devenu un ! Vous ne savez pas comment reprendre forme humaine ni de quelle façon vous avez atterri là ! Mais il y a peut-être une raison à tout cela. Vous comprenez désormais la langue des Pokémon et apprenez qu'une série de catastrophes naturelles menace leur communauté. Vous deviendrez alors vite ami avec un autre Pokémon et formerez une Equipe de Secours pour aider les Pokémon en danger. Vous serez envoyé en mission pour sauver des Pokémon pris au piège dans des donjons dangereux, générés de façon aléatoire (vous ne jouez donc jamais deux fois dans le même donjon) et vous affronterez des Pokémon sauvages en utilisant un système de combat au tour par tour.

movies.name: Pokémon™ Donjon Mystère : Equipe de Secours Rouge : vidéo

movies.name: Pokémon™ Mystery Dungeon: Red Rescue Team: Video

ES.name: Pokémon™ Mundo misterioso: Equipo de rescate rojo
ES.description: Los has cazado, los has entrenado y has combatido contra ellos... y ahora tienes la oportunidad de ser uno de ellos, ¡de ser un Pokémon! En Pokémon Mundo misterioso: Equipo de rescate rojo, te despiertas en un mundo habitado por Pokémon en el que tú también eres un Pokémon. No sabes cómo has llegado hasta allí ni cómo recuperar tu forma humana. Pero quizás haya un motivo para tu llegada... Ahora que puedes entender el lenguaje de los Pokémon, te enteras de que la comunidad está amenazada por una serie de desastres naturales. No tardas mucho en trabar amistad con otros Pokémon y formar un Equipo de rescate para ayudar a los Pokémon que están en peligro. Se te asignarán misiones de rescate en las que tendrás que ayudar a Pokémon que están atrapados en peligrosas mazmorras que se generan de forma aleatoria (o sea, que nunca jugarás dos veces en la misma mazmorra), y tendrás que combatir a los Pokémon salvajes utilizando un sistema de combate por turnos.

movies.name: Pokémon™ Mundo misterioso: Equipo de rescate rojo: Vídeo

movies.name: Pokémon™ Mystery Dungeon: Red Rescue Team: Video

IT.name: Pokémon™ Mystery Dungeon: Squadra Rossa
IT.description: Li hai presi, li hai allenati, hai combattuto contro di loro... ora puoi scoprire cosa si prova ad essere un Pokémon! In Pokémon Mystery Dungeon: Squadra Rossa, ti risvegli in un mondo abitato interamente da Pokémon, e tu stesso sei un Pokémon e non sai come sei finito lì né come tornare a essere un umano. Ma forse il tuo arrivo ha un motivo. Ora che puoi capire la lingua Pokémon, ti rendi conto che una serie di disastri naturali sta minacciando la comunità. Ben presto diventi amico di un altro Pokémon e insieme formate una squadra per aiutare gli altri Pokémon in pericolo. La tua missione sarà salvare i Pokémon intrappolati in pericolosi dungeon generati in maniera casuale (il che vuol dire che non giocherai mai lo stesso dungeon due volte), lottando contro Pokémon selvaggi usando uno stile di combattimento basato sui turni.

movies.name: Pokémon™ Mystery Dungeon: Squadra Rossa: video

LT.name: Pokémon™ Mystery Dungeon: Red Rescue Team
LT.description: You've caught them, you've trained them and you've battled them - but now you can find out what it's actually like to be a Pokémon! movies.name: Pokémon™ Mystery Dungeon: Red Rescue Team: Video

NL.name: Pokémon™ Mystery Dungeon: Red Rescue Team
NL.description: Je hebt ze gevangen, je hebt ze getraind en je hebt ze bevochten... maar nu kun je ontdekken wat het is om een Pokémon te zijn. In Pokémon Mystery Dungeon: Red Rescue Team ontwaak je, als Pokémon, in een wereld die volledig door Pokémon bevolkt is, zonder dat je weet hoe je er bent beland of hoe je je menselijke vorm kunt terugkrijgen. Maar er is misschien een reden voor je komst. Nu je de Pokémon-taal begrijpt, ontdek je dat de bevolking wordt bedreigd door een serie natuurrampen. Al snel maak je vrienden met andere Pokémon en vorm je een 'Rescue Team' om Pokémon in nood te helpen. Je krijgt missies om Pokémon te redden die opgesloten zitten in gevaarlijke, altijd willekeurig gegenereerde kerkers (wat betekent dat je nooit twee keer dezelfde kerker tegenkomt). Je moet wilde Pokémon om beurten bevechten.

movies.name: Pokémon™ Mystery Dungeon: Red Rescue Team: Video

NZ.name: Pokémon™ Mystery Dungeon: Red Rescue Team
NZ.description: You've caught them, you've trained them and you've battled them - but now you can find out what it's actually like to be a Pokémon! In Pokémon Mystery Dungeon: Red Rescue Team, you wake up in a world inhabited entirely by Pokémon, as a Pokémon yourself, with no knowledge of how you got there or how you can return to human form. movies.name: Pokémon™ Mystery Dungeon: Red Rescue Team: Video

PL.name: Pokémon™ Mystery Dungeon: Red Rescue Team
PL.description: You've caught them, you've trained them and you've battled them - but now you can find out what it's actually like to be a Pokémon! But perhaps there's a reason for your arrival. Now that you can understand the Pokémon language, you learn that a series of natural disasters is threatening the community. You soon befriend another Pokémon and form a Rescue Team to help Pokémon in distress. You receive missions to rescue Pokémon trapped in dangerous dungeons, which are always randomly generated (meaning that you'll never play the same dungeon twice), battling wild Pokémon using a turn-based style of combat.

movies.name: Pokémon™ Mystery Dungeon: Red Rescue Team: Video

PT.name: Pokémon™ Mystery Dungeon: Red Rescue Team
PT.description: Já os apanhaste, já os treinaste e já os enfrentaste... Agora, irás descobrir como é ser um Pokémon! Em Pokémon Mystery Dungeon: Red Rescue Team, acordas num mundo habitado inteiramente por Pokémon. Para mais, és também tu um Pokémon, sem lembrança de como chegaste até ali nem como regressar à forma humana. Mas talvez haja uma razão para a tua chegada! Agora que compreendes a linguagem dos Pokémon, descobres que uma série de desastres naturais ameaça a comunidade. Logo fazes amizade com outro Pokémon e juntos formam uma equipa de resgate para ajudar os Pokémon em apuros. Irás receber missões para salvar Pokémon encurralados em perigosas masmorras, sempre geradas aleatoriamente (o que significa que nunca jogarás na mesma masmorra duas vezes) e enfrentar Pokémon selvagens usando um sistema de combate por turnos.

movies.name: Pokémon™ Mystery Dungeon: Red Rescue Team: Vídeo

RU.name: Pokémon™ Mystery Dungeon: Red Rescue Team
RU.description: Вы их ловили, вы их тренировали, вы отправляли их в бой. Но вот, наконец, вам представляется возможность узнать, что значит быть покемоном! В игре Pokémon Mystery Dungeon: Red Rescue Team вы очнетесь покемоном в мире, населенном только покемонами, без представления, как вы туда попали и как вернуться в человеческий образ. Но, возможно, ваше появление здесь - неслучайность? Имея возможность общаться с покемонами на их языке, вы узнаете, что им угрожает череда природных бедствий. Вскоре вы подружитесь с другими покемонами и организуете отряд для спасения попавших в беду покемонов. Вы будете получать задания по спасению покемонов в полных опасности подземельях, которые генерируются случайным образом (а это значит, что каждое подземелье будет особенным), сражаясь при этом с дикими покемонами в пошаговых боях.

movies.name: Pokémon™ Mystery Dungeon: Red Rescue Team: видео

SE.name: Pokémon™ Mystery Dungeon: Red Rescue Team
SE.description: You've caught them, you've trained them and you've battled them - but now you can find out what it's actually like to be a Pokémon! In Pokémon Mystery Dungeon: Red Rescue Team, you wake up in a world inhabited entirely by Pokémon, as a Pokémon yourself, with no knowledge of how you got there or how you can return to human form. But perhaps there's a reason for your arrival. Now that you can understand the Pokémon language, you learn that a series of natural disasters is threatening the community. You soon befriend another Pokémon and form a Rescue Team to help Pokémon in distress. You receive missions to rescue Pokémon trapped in dangerous dungeons, which are always randomly generated (meaning that you'll never play the same dungeon twice), battling wild Pokémon using a turn-based style of combat.

movies.name: Pokémon™ Mystery Dungeon: Red Rescue Team: Video

SI.name: Pokémon™ Mystery Dungeon: Red Rescue Team
SI.description: You've caught them, you've trained them and you've battled them - but now you can find out what it's actually like to be a Pokémon!
